Generation IV.Diamond: It can learn and speak human words. If they gather, they all learn the same saying.
Generation IV.Pearl: It keeps rhythm by flicking its tail feathers like a metronome. It imitates human speech.
Generation IV.Platinum: Its tongue is just like a human's. As a result, it can cleverly mimic human speech.
Generation IV.HeartGold: It mimics the cries of other Pokémon to trick them into thinking it's one of them. This way they won't attack it.
Generation IV.SoulSilver: It mimics the cries of other Pokémon to trick them into thinking it's one of them. This way they won't attack it.

Generation VI.Omega Ruby: It mimics the cries of other Pokémon to trick them into thinking it's one of them. This way they won't attack it.
Generation VI.Alpha Sapphire: It can learn and speak human words. If they gather, they all learn the same saying.

Generation VIII.Brilliant Diamond: They can learn and speak human words. If they gather, they all learn the same saying.
Generation VIII.Shining Pearl: It keeps rhythm by flicking its tail feathers like a metronome. It also imitates human speech.
Generation VIII.Legends: Arceus: A versatile performer skilled in the imitation of human speech. It is said that older, more experienced Chatot can even understand the meaning of the words they mimic.
